info.author: Brandon Wernke
info.description: This mini app is my first application with a GUI. It uses easygui, and is therefore very basic. I have created an app that rolls a user defined die a million times, and calculates the average roll. This would be useful for anyone who does not know the easy way to discover the average of a die roll for an even numbered die.
info.keywords: dungeons and dragons dice average roll
info.name: Dice-Average
info.summary: An average die roll out of a million rolls for a user defined die
